nodes.text: Shaft 16 was a mining shaft on the Eastern Ice Shelf of Ilum, established by the miners of the Minos-Mestra Corporation around 3631 BBY. After the miners accidentally desecrated the burial site of Xivhkalrainik's father, his son, Sith Lord Xalek began attacking their mining camps, slaughtering everyone and leaving no survivors. Shaft 16 was one of his targets, where everyone present there at the time of the attack perished.
Shaft 16 appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire during Xalek Alliance alert mission.
